Functions

 EVALUATE (safrecip__residual)
 Default residual inverse for all ports.

Detailed Description

Numerically robust reciprocal operator c = 1/a.

Use in place of recip.cc whenever division by zero arises.

Note:
Numerically more costly than recip.cc because it will force the matched variable to be a break variable.
Attention:

Default residual inverse for all ports.

Returns:
residual = 1.0 - a * c
